name: Divine Favor
description: Until the spell ends, your attacks with weapons deal an extra 1d4 Radiant damage on a hit. Divine Smite A DWARF PALADIN EMPOWERS HER WEAPON WITH DIVINE SMITE, UNLEASHING HOLY WRATH ON FIENDISH MEZZOLOTHS ARTIST: BRYAN SOLA

Level 1 Evocation (Paladin) Casting Time: Bonus Action, which you take immediately after hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike Range: Self Component: V Duration: Instantaneous The target takes an extra 2d8 Radiant damage from the attack. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is a Fiend or an Undead. Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.
